analysis.description:
Winner.playerNumbers (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#262-264) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- bet (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#368-436)
	- assign2 (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#443-478)
	- refund2 (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#485-523)
	- getPlayerRoundNumbers (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#527-531)
UpgradeabilityProxy.implementation (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#641-644) is declared view but contains assembly code
OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy.proxyOwner (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#707-713) is declared view but contains assembly code

Winner.assign2 has external calls inside a loop:
	- _player.transfer(bonus) (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#465)

Winner.assign2 has external calls inside a loop:
	- platform.transfer(fund) (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#467-469)

Winner.refund2 (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#485-523) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp.sub(rounds[curRoundID].timestamp) >= MAX_DURATION,it's not time for refunding) (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#486-490)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol#346-366:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Low level call in OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy.upgradeToAndCall (/unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol):
	-require(bool,string)(address(this).call.value(msg.value)(data),data is invalid) /unique_contracts/0x2b096314d5ec92e484c0a946c4219e7e68600c78.sol
